languages.text: "Омниссия даровал мне откровение. Дух сей машины умирал, но желал свершить пользу, ибо таков его замысел. Я почувствовал это и... обратился к нему. Мне неведомо, как я это сделал — лишь последовал наитию. Понимание, дарованное Омниссией, не было перманентным, оно оставило меня". {n}Техножрец выглядит потрясенным.{/n}

"The Omnissiah granted me a revelation. The spirit of this machine was dying, but it wished to perform a service, for such was its design. I sensed this and... appealed to it. I do not know how I did it — I merely followed my intuition. The understanding granted by the Omnissiah was not permanent — it has left me. " {n}The Tech-Priest appears shaken.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Омниссия даровал мне откровение. Дух сей машины умирал, но желал свершить пользу, ибо таков его замысел. Я почувствовал это и... обратился к нему. Мне неведомо, как я это сделал — лишь последовал наитию. Понимание, дарованное Омниссией, не было перманентным, оно оставило меня". {n}Техножрец выглядит потрясенным.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "The Omnissiah granted me a revelation. The spirit of this machine was dying, but it wished to perform a service, for such was its design. I sensed this and... appealed to it. I do not know how I did it — I merely followed my intuition. The understanding granted by the Omnissiah was not permanent — it has left me. " {n}The Tech-Priest appears shaken.{/n}

{n}The booming binary trill emitted by the vox-system is reminiscent of laughter or a jubilant, triumphant prayer.{/n} "A response to the request issued cannot be granted. The Omnissiah bestowed upon me a revelation — I sensed the dying spirit of this mortally wounded machine and reached out to it with a dirge. The machine spirit answered. This appeal is not a standard procedure, and the understanding of it that was granted to me by the Omnissiah was impermanent."

{n}The ringing binharic trill emitted by the vox-system is reminiscent of laughter or a jubilant, triumphant prayer.{/n} "A response to the request issued cannot be granted. The Omnissiah bestowed upon me a revelation — I sensed the dying spirit of this mortally wounded machine and reached out to it with a dirge. The machine spirit answered. This appeal is not a standard procedure, and the understanding of it that was granted to me by the Omnissiah was impermanent."

{n}The ringing binharic trill emitted by the vox-system is reminiscent of laughter or a jubilant, triumphant prayer.{/n} "A response to the request issued cannot be granted. The Omnissiah bestowed upon me a revelation — I sensed the dying spirit of this mortally wounded machine and reached out to it with a dirge. The machine spirit answered. This appeal is not a standard procedure, and the understanding of it that was granted to me by the Omnissiah was impermanent."

"The Omnissiah granted me a revelation. The spirit of this machine was dying, but it wished to perform a service, for such was its design. I sensed this and... appealed to it. I do not know how I did it — I merely followed my intuition. The understanding granted by the Omnissiah was not permanent — it has left me. " {n}The Tech-Priest appears shaken.{/n}

"The Omnissiah granted me a revelation. The spirit of this machine was dying, but it wished to perform a service, for such was its design. I sensed this and... appealed to it. I do not know how I did it — I merely followed my intuition. The understanding granted by the Omnissiah was not permanent — it has left me. " {n}The Tech-Priest appears shaken.{/n}

languages.text: “欧姆尼塞亚赐予了我启示。那台机器的机魂正在消亡，但它希望执行最后的服务，因为这正是它的目的。我察觉到了它的意愿……向它寻求帮助。我也不知道我究竟是怎么做到的，我仅仅是跟随我的直觉而已。然而，欧姆尼塞亚赐予我的启示并非永久存在，祂的启示已经离我而去。”{n}这位技术神甫的声音听起来似乎有些动摇。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Omnissiah granted me a revelation. The spirit of this machine was dying, but it wished to perform a service, for such was its design. I sensed this and... appealed to it. I do not know how I did it — I merely followed my intuition. The understanding granted by the Omnissiah was not permanent — it has left me. " {n}The Tech-Priest appears shaken.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “已经对该请求做出了回应。这是因为欧姆尼塞亚赐予了我启示。这台机器的机魂受了致命伤，已经处于死亡边缘。我感觉到了启示，向机魂发出了哀悼，它也回应了我。这样的呼唤并非标准程序，欧姆尼塞亚也并非总会赐予我这样的启示。”

languages.text: «El Omnissiah me otorgó una revelación: el espíritu de esta máquina estaba moribundo, pero quería servir la función para la que había sido diseñada. Pude sentirlo y... apelé a él. No sé cómo. Me dejé guiar por la intuición. La comprensión que me otorgó el Omnissiah sobre ella no era permanente... y se ha desvanecido». {n}El tecnosacerdote parece conmocionado.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Omnissiah granted me a revelation. The spirit of this machine was dying, but it wished to perform a service, for such was its design. I sensed this and... appealed to it. I do not know how I did it — I merely followed my intuition. The understanding granted by the Omnissiah was not permanent — it has left me. " {n}The Tech-Priest appears shaken.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Es imposible dar respuesta a la solicitud realizada. El Omnissiah me otorgó una revelación: sentí el espíritu moribundo de esta máquina herida y le dediqué un canto fúnebre. El espíritu máquina respondió. Esta apelación no es un procedimiento estándar, y la comprensión que me otorgó el Omnissiah sobre ella no era permanente».

languages.text: 「万機神が自分に啓示を与えてくださいました。この機械の魂は死にかけていたが、役目として奉仕することを臨んでいたのです。自分はそれを感じ取り、それに訴えた。何をどうしたのかはわかりませんが、本能に従ったのです。しかし、万機神から与えられた理解は一時的なものにすぎなかった」{n}技術司祭は、動揺しているように見える。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Omnissiah granted me a revelation. The spirit of this machine was dying, but it wished to perform a service, for such was its design. I sensed this and... appealed to it. I do not know how I did it — I merely followed my intuition. The understanding granted by the Omnissiah was not permanent — it has left me. " {n}The Tech-Priest appears shaken.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「万機神が私に啓示を与えてくれた。この機械の魂は死にかけていたが、役目として奉仕することを臨んでいた。私は、それを感じ取り、それに訴えた。どうやってしたのかは分からないが、本能に従った。しかし、万機神から与えられた理解は一時的なものにすぎなかった」{n}技術司祭は、動揺しているように見える。{/n}

languages.text: « L'Omnimessie m'a octroyé une révélation. L'esprit de cette machine avait beau être mourant, il souhaitait tout de même se rendre utile, conformément à sa vocation première. Je l'ai senti et... j'ai fait appel à lui. Ne me demandez pas comment je m'y suis pris, je me suis contenté de suivre mon intuition. La compréhension accordée par l'Omnimessie était éphémère et elle m'a quitté depuis. » {n}Le technoprêtre semble bouleversé.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Omnissiah granted me a revelation. The spirit of this machine was dying, but it wished to perform a service, for such was its design. I sensed this and... appealed to it. I do not know how I did it — I merely followed my intuition. The understanding granted by the Omnissiah was not permanent — it has left me. " {n}The Tech-Priest appears shaken.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je ne suis pas en mesure de répondre à cette question. L'Omnimessie m'a fait une révélation : j'ai senti l'esprit mourant de cette machine à l'agonie et je lui ai envoyé un chant funèbre, puis son esprit m'a répondu. Ce n'est pas ma façon de procéder habituelle, et la compréhension que m'a accordée l'Omnimessie n'était que temporaire. »

languages.text: "Der Omnissiah hat mir eine Offenbarung gewährt. Der Geist dieser Maschine lag im Sterben, doch er wollte einen Dienst erbringen, denn dafür wurde er erschaffen. Ich habe das gespürt und ... an ihn appelliert. Ich weiß nicht, wie es mir gelungen ist, ich bin lediglich meiner Intuition gefolgt. Das vom Omnissiah gewährte Verständnis war nicht von Dauer, es hat mich verlassen. " {n}Der Techpriester wirkt aufgewühlt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Omnissiah granted me a revelation. The spirit of this machine was dying, but it wished to perform a service, for such was its design. I sensed this and... appealed to it. I do not know how I did it — I merely followed my intuition. The understanding granted by the Omnissiah was not permanent — it has left me. " {n}The Tech-Priest appears shaken.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Eine Antwort auf diese Anfrage kann nicht gegeben werden. Der Omnissiah hat mir eine Offenbarung übermittelt – ich spürte den sterbenden Geist dieser tödlich verwundeten Maschine und wollte mit einem Totengesang Kontakt herstellen. Der Maschinengeist hat geantwortet. Diese Anfrage entsprach keiner Standardprozedur, und der Omnissiah hat mir nur vorübergehend ermöglicht, sie zu verstehen."

languages.original_text: "The Omnissiah granted me a revelation. The spirit of this machine was dying, but it wished to perform a service, for such was its design. I sensed this and... appealed to it. I do not know how I did it — I merely followed my intuition. The understanding granted by the Omnissiah was not permanent — it has left me. " {n}The Tech-Priest appears shaken.{/n}

languages.text: "Hermesih'ten bana vahiy tecelli etti. Bu makinenin ruhu ölse de hizmete devam etme arzusundaydı. Zira öyle yaratılmıştı. Bunu hissederek yardımına geldim. Nasıl yaptım bilemiyorum, sezgilerime kulak verdim sadece. Lakin Hermesih'in bahşettiği algı kalıcı değildi. Beni terk etti." {n}Tekno Rahip, sarsılmış görünüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Omnissiah granted me a revelation. The spirit of this machine was dying, but it wished to perform a service, for such was its design. I sensed this and... appealed to it. I do not know how I did it — I merely followed my intuition. The understanding granted by the Omnissiah was not permanent — it has left me. " {n}The Tech-Priest appears shaken.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Hermesih'ten bana vahiy tecelli etti. Bu makinenin ruhu ölse de hizmete devam etme arzusundaydı. Zira öyle yaratılmıştı. Bunu hissederek yardımına geldim. Nasıl yaptım bilemiyorum, sezgilerime kulak verdim sadece. Lakin Hermesih'in bahşettiği algı kalıcı değildi. Beni terk etti. {n}Tekno Rahip, sarsılmış görünüyor.{/n}
